scripts.link: ln -s ../packages/firenpm node_modules/firenpm && ln -s ../../packages/firenpm template/node_modules/firenpm && ln -s ../../../packages/firenpm/bin/eslint.js template/node_modules/.bin/eslint && ln -s ../../../packages/firenpm/bin/babel.js template/node_modules/.bin/babel && ln -s ../../../packages/firenpm/bin/mocha.js template/node_modules/.bin/mocha
scripts.unlink: rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf template/node_modules && mkdir node_modules && mkdir -p template/node_modules/.bin
scripts.install: (cd packages/firenpm && npm install) && (cd packages/firenpm.cli && npm install) && mkdir -p template/node_modules/.bin && npm run link
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf template/node_modules && rm -rf packages/firenpm/node_modules && rm -rf packages/firenpm.cli/node_modules
